sentences: Kuulas, et nad mõlemad olid juba minemas.
Ma olen just nii vähe aega vabadusest, et ma ei soovi midagi muud kui lihtsalt minema.
context: The Estonian word 'minema' is a verb that means to depart or to move from one place to another. It can also be used metaphorically in the sense of ceasing to exist or being out of reach.
